articles.author: China Daily, China Daily
articles.title: Chinese astronomers calculate mass of Andromeda Galaxy with new precision - asianews.network
articles.description: With a distance of about 2.5 million light-years from the Earth, the Andromeda Galaxy is the nearest large spiral galaxy to the Milky Way.
articles.content:
February 8, 2024
BEIJING – Utilizing the spectrum data gathered by the Large Sky Area Multi-Object Fiber Spectroscopic Telescope, along with other surveys and observations, Chinese astronomers have … [+1967 chars]
